description: Number of partitions of n into fourth powers.
references: H. P. Robinson, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Jan 04 1974.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: g = -1 + 1/Product[1 - x^(j^4), {j, 1, 10}]; gser =Series[g, {x, 0, 105}]; Table[Coefficient[gser, x, n], {n, 1, 102}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 29 2012, after _Emeric Deutsch_ *)
prog: (Haskell)a046042 = p $ tail a000583_list where   p _          0 = 1   p ks'@(k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks' (m - k) + p ks m-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 18 2015   ~
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
